name: Clay Lake Fishing
description:
Enjoy a relaxing fish on the lake of clay.

Bearraco the Bear and Misu the Cat are hungry for some fish, however the fish are schooling and the only way to get a tasty fish is break up the groups!

Throw your harpoon at the fish to catch them, but be careful, if another fish bumps into your catch they will knock it off and you'll be left empty handed!

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows to move
  • Left Mouse to throw harpoon
  • Left Mouse to reel in harpoon after thrown
  • Q: Zoom In
  • E: Zoom Out

This idea is based on the Selfish Herd Theory that basically says animals will move to the center of a group to avoid being eaten by a predator. The fish school to make it harder for our bear and cat duo to nab their dinner!

Hint: The fish will not recognize you as a predator if you stay motionless

I had planned on a few different styles of levels, but ran out of time so there is just the "endless" relaxation mode where you can float around and catch fish at your leisure.
